nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.members

Interface ElementDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<Element>, DeletableDAO<Element>, IndexedDAO<Element>, InsertableDAO<Element>, UpdatableDAO<Element>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElementDAOImpl

    public interface ElementDAO
extends BaseDAO<Element>, InsertableDAO<Element>, UpdatableDAO<Element>, DeletableDAO<Element>, IndexedDAO<Element>
    Data access object interface for elements
    Author:
    rafael

      • getNewMembersCountThroughTheTime

        java.util.List<java.lang.Number[]> getNewMembersCountThroughTheTime(java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups,
                                                                  Period period)
                                                                    throws DaoException
        Returns the number of new members through the years, during a date interval The key of the returned Map is the year The value of the returned Map is the number of members
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • getNumberOfMembersInGroupsInPeriod

        int getNumberOfMembersInGroupsInPeriod(java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups,
                                     Period period)
        gets the number of members which were in the specified group at any moment during the specified period. Used by Activity Stats: gross Product, number of transactions and % not trading for compare periods, Histogram, Single Period, and by Key dev stats: number of members
        Parameters:
        groups - the set of groups in which the members must be counted.
        period - the period in which they should be part of any of the groups
        Returns:
        an int indicating the number of members during that period in that set of groups

      • getRemovedMembersCountThroughTheTime

        java.util.List<java.lang.Number[]> getRemovedMembersCountThroughTheTime(java.util.Collection<? extends Group> groups,
                                                                      Period period)
                                                                        throws DaoException
        Returns the number of removed members through the years, during a date interval. The count is specific for each year (not a sum with the number of previous years). The key of the returned Map is the year The value of the returned Map is the number of members
        Parameters:
        groups - limit the count for members of that groups
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • search

        java.util.List<? extends Element> search(ElementQuery params)
                                         throws DaoException
        Search elements, ordering results by username. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation it should be wrapped by DaoException.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • searchAtDate

        java.util.List<Element> searchAtDate(MemberQuery query,
                                   java.util.Calendar date)
        Search members in history in a point date; search in the remarks and groups, if needed, ordering results by username. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation it should be wrapped by DaoException.

      • searchHistoryNew

        java.util.List<Element> searchHistoryNew(ElementQuery query)
        Search new elements in history in a period; search in the remarks and groups, if needed, ordering results by username. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation it should be wrapped by DaoException. Used by Stats Key Dev > number new members

      • searchHistoryRemoved

        java.util.List<Element> searchHistoryRemoved(ElementQuery query)
        Search the removed elements in history in a period; search in the remarks and groups, if needed, ordering results by username. If no entity can be found, returns an empty list. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation it should be wrapped by DaoException. Used by Stats Key Developments > number of (disappeared) members
